Package com.diy.hardware

package com.diy.hardware
  • Related Packages

    Description
    com.diy.hardware.external
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AttendantStation
    Represents the station used by the attendant.
    BarcodedProduct
    Represents products with barcodes.
    CoinTray
    Simulates the tray where dispensed coins go for the user to collect them.
    DoItYourselfStation
    Represents the overall self-checkout station.
    PLUCodedItem
    Represents items for sale, each with a particular price-lookup code and weight.
    PLUCodedProduct
    Represents products with price-lookup (PLU) codes.
    PriceLookUpCode
    Represents a PLU value, a sequence of digits that, in principle, could lie anywhere in the range 0000-99999.
    Product
    Abstract base class for products.
    UnidirectionalChannel<T>
    Represents a simple device (like, say, a tube) that allows things to move in one direction between other devices.
